title: Nuforce ICON-UDAC2-BLACK Headphone Amplifier and USB DAC (Discontinued by Manufacturer)
description: The NuForce uDAC-2 is a high-performance, 24bit/96kHz USB Digital Audio Converter (DAC) that connects your personal computer's audio to your home stereo, desktop sound system, or headphones to deliver superior sound. It improves upon our original dual model by providing a highly linear TOCOS volume control for improved channel tracking at low listening levels, a 24bit/96kHz USB DAC, and an improved headphone amp. Nuforce USB Audio devices are designed to work with x86 architecture.  Tablet devices running Windows 8 (RT) are not supported.
